mapper.select: /* 육성 현황 조회 */ SELECT ENT_NOCS , ENT_CRTR_YMD , INVEST_NOCS , INVEST_CRTR_YMD , AFFILIATE_NOCS , AFFILIATE_CRTR_YMD FROM KB_RSLT_INFO

/* 메인 비주얼 조회 */ SELECT VISUAL.MAIN_SN AS MAIN_SN , VISUAL.MAIN_CN AS MAIN_CN , FILES.ORGNL_FILE_NM AS ORIGIN_FILE_NAME , FILES.FILE_NM AS MAIN_FILE_NAME , FILES.FILE_PATH AS MAIN_PATH FROM KB_MAIN_INFO VISUAL , KB_FILE_INFO FILES WHERE VISUAL.ATCH_FILE_SN = FILES.FILE_SN(+) AND VISUAL.EXPSR_YN = 'Y' ORDER BY VISUAL.SORT_NO ASC

/* 팝업 조회 */ SELECT POPUP_SN , MNGR_TTL , BGNG_YMD , BGNG_HR , END_YMD , END_HR , POPUP_LEFT_PSTN , POPUP_TOP_PSTN , REPLACE(POPUP_CN, 'kbinnovationhub_devadm', 'kbinnovationhub') POPUP_CN FROM KB_POPUP_INFO WHERE 1 = 1 AND TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(END_YMD, 'YYYYMMDD'), 'YYYYMMDD') || ' ' || TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(END_HR, 'HH24MI'), 'HH24MI') >= TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD HH24MI');

SELECT HSTRY_YR , HSTRY_LCLSF_SN , HSTRY_LCLSF_TTL , HSTRY_LCLSF_SORT_NO , HSTRY_SCLSF_SN , HSTRY_SCLSF_TTL , HSTRY_SCLSF_SORT_NO , HSTRY_SCLSF_UP_LCLSF_SN , CASE WHEN LAG(HSTRY_LCLSF_SN) OVER (PARTITION BY HSTRY_YR ORDER BY HSTRY_LCLSF_SN ASC, HSTRY_SCLSF_SN ASC) IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE LAG(HSTRY_LCLSF_SN) OVER (PARTITION BY HSTRY_YR ORDER BY HSTRY_LCLSF_SN ASC, HSTRY_SCLSF_SN ASC) END AS DISPLAY_YN , '항목 ' || HSTRY_LCLSF_SN AS H_TITLE , 'main_sn' || HSTRY_LCLSF_SN AS MAIN_SN , 'sub_sn' || HSTRY_SCLSF_SN AS SUB_SN , COUNT(HSTRY_LCLSF_SN) OVER (PARTITION BY HSTRY_YR ORDER BY HSTRY_LCLSF_SN ASC) CNT_OVER FROM KB_CO_HSTRY_INFO WHERE 1 = 1 ORDER BY HSTRY_YR DESC, HSTRY_LCLSF_SN ASC, HSTRY_SCLSF_SN ASC
/* 메뉴 조회 */ SELECT MENU_NM , MENU_SN , MENU_DEPTH , MENU_UP_SN , MENU_LINK , MENU_SORT FROM KB_USER_MENU WHERE USE_YN = 'Y' ORDER BY MENU_SN, MENU_SORT
